body: This is the landing page. For services or help, please use the options below.  Guns Books Piracy

Guns, Books, and Piracy, what more could one possibly ask for?I created this site for a few different reasons: To see what was possible with self-hosting, test my abilities in web development and networking, and to be a personal cloud service. I am now opening the project up for public use, including my database of various files. The Guns CAD and 3D print files for the manufacture of firearms and firearm parts at home. The Books Books and PDFs pertaining to freedom, liberty, and chaos.  The Piracy Software that is kept behind a paywall, subscription based, or adware, now made free and hosted here. I also include a list of open-source software that are helpful and completely free to use.

Jellyfin Media My personal collection of entertainment media. Available everywhere by stream. Minecraft Server My custom Spigot Minecraft server, but usually isn't running.Check status below. (Empty) (Nothing here yet)Possibly more web services coming soon!
